item.title: CVE-2024-38694|2024-08-02T04:19:20.338Z -- moloni -- moloni
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Moloni allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Moloni: from n/a through 4.7.4.
